text: midneun salamdeul-iyeo neohui hoejung e gong-gan-eul dula yaegileul deul-eul ttaemyeon gong-gan-eul dula hananimkkeseo neohuie gedeo keun geos-eul jusilila geuligo il eoseola mal-eul deul-eul ttaemyeon il-eoseola hananimkkeseo deo nop-i il-eukyeo jusi lila hananim-eun mid-eum-eul gajin jawa jisig-eul gajin ja-ege deo nop-eun gos eul jusinani sillo hananim-eun neohui ga haenghaneun modeun geos-eul jikyeobogo gye sinila
